title: Windows 11 is getting a new Sound Recorder app, and Insiders can try it now
content:
Microsoft is preparing an all-new design for the Voice Recorder app on Windows 11 – which will now be known as Sound Recorder. Like many of the bundled apps Microsoft has updated for the new OS – such as Paint, Notepad, and Clock – the new Sound Recorder features a new design language more in

The post Windows 11 is getting a new Sound Recorder app, and Insiders can try it now appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft has announced a new Sound Recorder app for Windows 11, featuring a new look and features. It's available in the Dev channel now.
